The Little River (also called Little Creek) is a river, approximately  long, in central Delaware in the United States.
It rises in central Kent County, approximately  northwest of Dover and flows generally east, entering Delaware Bay approximately 6 mi (10 km) east of Dover. The lower  of the river is surrounded by extensive tidal wetlands protected as part of the Little Creek Wildlife Area.

*List of Delaware rivers
